metadata.title: CVE-2023-36328 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer Overflow vulnerability in mp_grow in libtom libtommath beforecommit beba892bc0d4e4ded4d667ab1d2a94f4d75109a9, allows attackers toexecute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service (DoS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-36328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtommath1 - 1.2.0-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtommath package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-3ubuntu0.1').
